attributes.action: Require music services to label AI-generated songs & an “AI-music off” setting
attributes.additional_details:
AI-generated music is increasingly difficult to distinguish from human-made recordings. Without clear labelling, listeners cannot make informed choices about what they are hearing, supporting, or sharing.

Transparent tagging will protect consumers, improve trust in streaming services, and help ensure fair recognition of human artists and songwriters.

We also want an optional toggle that enables users to exclude AI-generated tracks from autoplay, radio, and algorithmic recommendations.
attributes.background: Require music streaming platforms operating in the UK, including Spotify and Apple Music, to clearly label when a track is AI-generated or substantially AI-assisted. We also want platforms to provide a user setting that allows listeners to block AI-generated music from being played or recommended.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action:

Require all AI musicians and songs to have a visible AI notice 
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/753997
